text: Sihamte tomaka candra samparke prasna karae. Koraa, 'e'ito manuhara arau hajjara babe samaya nirdharaka; arau picha phalerae gharata praraesa karaato kono punyara kama nahaya, baram punya haiche karaobara takbaraa aralambana karaa. Eteke tomaloke gharata praraesa karaa (sanmukhara) duraaraerae arau tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa, yate tomaloke saphalata arjana karaiba paraa
